After the warning against the worship of the beast and his image the prophecy declares: "Here are they that keep the commandments of God, and the faith of Jesus." Since those who keep God's commandments are thus placed in contrast with those that worship the beast and his image and receive his mark, it follows that the keeping of God's law, on the 
                                                                           446
one hand, and its violation, on the other, will make the distinction between the worshipers of God and the worshipers of the beast.
